Description: Gold filigree pendant with cloisonné enamel inset. Includes images of two birds.
Bibliographic references: Tait 1986a / Seven Thousand Years of Jewellery (335)
Akbarnia et al 2018 / The Islamic World: a History in Objects (p.107, fig.2)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2012 19 Mar-2 Jun, Qatar, Doha, Museum of Islamic Art, 'Gifts of the Sultans' 2011-2012 23 Oct-15 Jan, USA, Houston, Museum of Fine Arts, 'Gifts of the Sultans' 2011 05 Jun-30 Sept, USA, Los Angeles, Los Angeles County Museum of Art, 'Gifts of the Sultans'
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Thomas H G Howard-Sneyd
